I am marking EVERY Elite quest and dungeons as optional in this guide. Especially on release you should do them!!! You'll easily find groups for elite quests and dungeons.
Talk to "Greer Orehammer" and do the bombing run.
Text: Talk to "Greer Orehammer" and do the bombing run.

Name: The following quest should be stopped the moment you loot a quest item called Scourge Device". Accept it
Action: turn it in. And the follow up Quest sends you back to where you killed the Undead before."

Name: The following parts are Group Quests. On release DO THEM. After 1-2 Month not many players will be doing them,so skip them. If youre skipping go to: GROUPQUEST-Part done"."

Name: Type /target Steelfeather"to find Steelfeather
Action: flying above. Use the Feathered Charm next to Gil Grisert to watch Steelfeather. Wait for the hippogryph to go back to her nest to receive the completion credit."
